hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Maze Path First Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# has #4# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest
